subject: New York City Marathon
Running
lead_paragraph: Peter Ciaccia, who will assume Mary Wittenberg’s marathon duties, has a recreational running background and an event producer’s mentality, and will focus on the experience of the race.
snippet: Peter Ciaccia, who will assume Mary Wittenberg’s marathon duties, has a recreational running background and an event producer’s mentality, and will focus on the experience of the race.
